positive_prompt: A medium upper-body shot of a female clown dancing slowly beneath carnival lights. Her red curls bounce with each motion, makeup immaculate, and her shoulders sway rhythmically. Warm orange bulbs flicker overhead, casting soft glows across her ruffled costume and painted skin. The background is a dreamy blur of tent silhouettes and wandering guests, evoking a surreal, almost theatrical mood. The camera remains steady, capturing her hypnotic gestures in rich, shallow focus.
negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿
